src_original: katamaiścaturbhiḥ?  iha maitreya pratibhānamarthopasaṃhitaṃ bhavati nānarthopasaṃhitam /  dharmopasaṃhitaṃ bhavati nādharmopasaṃhitam /  kleśaprahāyakaṃ bhavati na kleśavivardhakam /
yasya kasyacinmaitreya etaiścaturbhiḥ pratibhāti pratibhāsyati vā,
tatra śrāddhaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhirvā buddhasaṃjñā utpādayitavyā /
